name: PingPlotter Data File
summary: Learn about .PP2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A PP2 file stores data collected by PingPlotter, a visual traceroute network troubleshooting tool. It allows network problems to be identified and monitored using a graphical display. Each PP2 file lists each location, or hop, that data moves through from its starting point to its destination. It includes IP addresses, DNS names, and response times.
